Mexican Party Delegation Arrives 
   Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Workers' Party of Mexico led by Francisco Amadeo, member of its National Executive Committee, arrived here Saturday to commemorate the Day of the Sun.

Kim Yong Dae Meets Kanji Inoki
articles.content:
Kim Yong Dae Meets Kanji Inoki 
   Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Dae, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a friendly talk with Kanji Inoki, advisor of the New Japanese Pro-Wrestling Co. Ltd., and his party at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Sunday.

Floral Basket Presented to DPRK Embassy in Vientiane
articles.content:
Floral Basket Presented to DPRK Embassy in Vientiane
   Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Thongloun Sisoulith, vice-prime minister and foreign minister of Laos who is member of the Political Bureau and chairman of the Commission for External Affairs of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, and Ponmek Dalaloy, minister of Health of Laos who is member of its Central Committee, presented a floral basket to the DPRK embassy in Vientiane on April 6 on the occasions of the Day of the Sun and the 75th anniversary of the heroic Korean People's Army.
